companyInfo.name: Qingdao Kaituo Longhai Refrigeration Components Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.scope: R&D, production and sales of air conditioning system components, including container series, pipeline components, heat exchangers, etc.

about.title: About Kaituo Longhai
about.subtitle: A high-tech enterprise focusing on the R&D and manufacturing of air conditioning system components.
overview: Qingdao Kaituo Longhai Refrigeration Components Co., Ltd. was founded on March 29, 2002. After more than 20 years of dedicated operation, it has developed into a high-tech and high value-added enterprise specializing in the manufacture of air conditioning system components. The company's R&D center is recognized as a city-level enterprise technology center in Qingdao and has also established a university-enterprise joint R&D platform with Shandong University and Shandong University of Science and Technology.

To meet the needs of business development, in August 2021, 'Qingdao Kaituo Longhai Intelligent Control Co., Ltd.' was fully established. The company is located in the SCO Demonstration Zone, Jiaozhou, Qingdao, with a factory area of 51,000 sqm, building area of 43,000 sqm, and registered capital of 20 million CNY.
production: • Plate, shell-and-tube heat exchangers, protective mesh and other businesses are also improving
• Planned annual output value: 880 million CNY

team.intro: We have a young, highly qualified, and professional talent echelon. The company has over 350 employees, of whom 35% have a university degree or above, and more than 30 are senior engineers in the industry.
team.youthDesc: A vibrant team, with an average age of 35
team.qualityDesc: 35% of employees have a higher education degree, constantly improving the quality of the team
team.professionalDesc: Over 30 senior engineers, with rich experience in their fields

partners.title: Strategic Partners
partners.desc: The company has established long-term strategic alliances with well-known domestic and foreign enterprises, with products exported to Japan, Europe, America, Thailand, South Korea, and other countries.

products.title: Core Products
products.containerDesc: Specialized in various types of air conditioning system containers, with an annual capacity of 3.2 million units.
products.pipeDesc: Annual output of 5,000 tons of copper fittings, 2,000 tons of damping blocks.
products.heatExchangerDesc: Professional products such as plate heat exchangers, shell-and-tube heat exchangers, etc.

founder.name: Founder Name
founder.motivationContent: In 2002, with a passion for the refrigeration industry and a persistent pursuit of technological innovation, I founded Kaituo Longhai. For more than 20 years, we have always adhered to customer-oriented approach and innovation-driven development, focusing on R&D and manufacturing of air conditioning system components.
founder.journeyContent: From a small workshop to today's modern enterprise, we have experienced countless challenges and opportunities. Every technological breakthrough and product innovation embodies the wisdom and hard work of our team. We have established deep partnerships with renowned companies like Mitsubishi Electric, Hitachi, and Haier, with products exported overseas.
founder.visionContent: Looking ahead, we will continue to uphold the corporate philosophy of 'Innovation, Quality, Service', continuously improve our technical capabilities, expand production capacity, provide better products and services to global customers, and strive to become a world-class manufacturer of air conditioning system components.

careers.subtitle: Join Kaituo Longhai and work with more than 350 outstanding colleagues to shape the future of air conditioning system components together.

jobs.title: Process Engineer
responsibilities: Responsible for process improvement and optimization of air conditioning system components
Develop and improve production processes
Solve technical problems in production
Improve product quality and production efficiency
Participate in process design and validation of new products
requirements: Bachelor's degree or above in mechanical, refrigeration or related fields
3+ years of relevant experience
Familiar with air conditioning component manufacturing processes
Good analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience in process improvement projects preferred

jobs.title: Quality Engineer
responsibilities: Establish and maintain product quality control systems
Develop quality inspection standards and procedures
Monitor product quality to ensure compliance with international standards
Handle customer quality complaints and improvement suggestions
Organize quality training and improvement activities
requirements: Bachelor's degree or above in quality management or related fields
Familiar with ISO9001 quality management system
Proficient in quality management tools
2+ years of quality management experience
Manufacturing quality management experience preferred

jobs.title: Production Supervisor
responsibilities: Responsible for daily management and optimization of production lines
Develop and execute production plans
Manage production teams and ensure safe production
Monitor production progress and product quality
Continuously improve production efficiency and cost control
requirements: College degree or above in mechanical or management related fields
5+ years of production management experience in manufacturing
Familiar with air conditioning components production processes
Strong team management and communication skills
Lean production management experience preferred

jobs.title: Sales Engineer
responsibilities: Responsible for sales of air conditioning system components
Develop and maintain customer relationships
Develop sales strategies and marketing plans
Participate in business negotiations and contract signing
Collect market information and customer feedback
requirements: Bachelor's degree or above in mechanical, refrigeration or related fields
Air conditioning industry sales experience preferred
Good communication and negotiation skills
Ability to work under pressure
B2B sales experience preferred

careers.noJobDesc: We always welcome outstanding talent. Please send your resume to our recruitment email.

receivers.title: Receiver Series
receivers.subtitle: Specializing in all kinds of air conditioning system receivers, ensuring stable refrigerant supply and providing solutions for all sizes.
receivers.overview: Our receiver products are made of high-quality materials, with excellent liquid storage performance and stable pressure control. Widely used in residential, commercial, and industrial air conditioning systems, providing reliable refrigerant storage solutions for customers.

products.name: R-001 Vertical Receiver
products.description: Suitable for small and medium air conditioning systems, with excellent storage and stable pressure control.

products.name: R-002 Horizontal Receiver
products.description: Designed for large commercial air conditioning systems, offering larger capacity and more stable performance.

products.name: R-003 High-Pressure Receiver
products.description: Professional receiver for high-pressure applications, suitable for industrial refrigeration and special environments.

products.name: R-004 Compact Receiver
products.description: Miniature design, suitable for applications with limited space, without sacrificing performance.

products.name: R-005 Smart Receiver
products.description: Integrated smart monitoring for real-time monitoring of liquid status and system parameters.

products.name: R-006 Eco-friendly Receiver
products.description: Uses environmentally friendly materials and processes, meeting the latest green standards, suitable for green buildings.

applications.residentialDesc: Suitable for home split units, central air conditioning and other small systems.
applications.commercialDesc: Ideal for shopping malls, office buildings, hotels, and other commercial AC systems.
applications.industrialDesc: Used in large refrigeration systems such as industrial cold storage and refrigeration equipment.

gasLiquidSeparators.title: Gas-Liquid Separator Series
gasLiquidSeparators.subtitle: Efficiently separates gas-liquid mixtures, improving air conditioning system efficiency and ensuring stable operation.
gasLiquidSeparators.overview: Our gas-liquid separators use advanced separation technology to efficiently separate gas and liquid in refrigerants, ensuring compressor safety and improving the efficiency and reliability of the whole system.

products.name: GLS-001 High-Efficiency Separator
products.description: Uses advanced separation technology, ensuring separation efficiency of over 99.5%.

products.name: GLS-002 Compact Separator
products.description: Compact design for space-limited applications, outstanding performance.

products.name: GLS-003 Heavy Duty Industrial Separator
products.description: Designed for heavy industrial applications, with strong capacity and stability.

products.name: GLS-004 Smart Separator
products.description: Integrated smart monitoring for real-time monitoring of separation effect and equipment status.

advantages.efficientDesc: Separation efficiency up to 99.8%, ensuring efficient operation.
advantages.lowPressureDesc: Optimized flow path design to minimize pressure loss.
advantages.maintenanceDesc: Simple and reliable structure, no special maintenance required.
advantages.corrosionDesc: Made with premium stainless steel to adapt to various working environments.

gasLiquidSeparators.customSolution: Need a professional gas-liquid separation solution?

oilSeparators.title: Oil Separator Series
oilSeparators.subtitle: Professional oil separation technology to protect compressors, extend service life, and ensure efficient system operation.

dampingBlocks.title: Damping Block Series
dampingBlocks.subtitle: Professional vibration and noise reduction, effectively lowering operating noise. Annual capacity: 2,000 tons.

shellTubeHeatExchangers.title: Shell-and-Tube Heat Exchanger Series
shellTubeHeatExchangers.subtitle: Efficient heat transfer equipment widely used in various air conditioning and refrigeration systems, providing excellent performance.

copperTubeSeries.title: Copper Tube Series
copperTubeSeries.subtitle: High-quality copper materials for various specifications, annual capacity: 5,000 tons.

plateHeatExchangers.title: Plate Heat Exchanger Series
plateHeatExchangers.subtitle: Compact and energy-saving, ideal for all types of refrigeration systems.
